tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mergers_and_acquisitions (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_name VARCHAR(100),
    acquirer_company VARCHAR(100),
    target_company VARCHAR(100),
    deal_value DECIMAL(18, 2),
    deal_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DealProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_id INT,
    progress_stage VARCHAR(50),
    update_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (deal_id) REFERENCES MergersAndAcquisitions(deal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mergers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    deal_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    deal_value DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    close_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE acquisitions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_company VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    acquiring_company VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    deal_value DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    announcement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentBank (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
description TEXT,
location VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE MergersAndAcquisitions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
advisor VARCHAR(100),
status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE DealProgress (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
deal_id INT,
progress_percentage FLOAT,
comments TEXT);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPortfolio (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
portfolio_name VARCHAR(255),
investment_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
investment_type VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE DealParticipants (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
participant_name VARCHAR(255),
role VARCHAR(100),
contact_email VARCHAR(255));
